name: Mini Platformer (George Games Studio)
description:
The world's best hardest, precision platformer with minimalist retro graphics.

  • 20 Levels to beat
  • Simple Controls
  • No level selection (hehe), you have to win at once!
  • Cute little cube

Controls

WASD/Arrows - Movement
